gr::packet_protocols::ax25_encoder:
AX.25 Encoder.

Constructor Specific Documentation:

Return a shared_ptr to a new instance of packet_protocols::ax25_encoder.

To avoid accidental use of raw pointers, packet_protocols::ax25_encoder's constructor is in a private implementation class. packet_protocols::ax25_encoder::make is the public interface for creating new instances.

Args:
    dest_callsign : 
    dest_ssid : 
    src_callsign : 
    src_ssid : 
    digipeaters : 
    command_response : 
    poll_final :

gr::packet_protocols::ax25_decoder_impl:
AX.25 Decoder Implementation.

This class implements AX.25 packet decoding using the real AX.25 protocol implementation from gr-m17.
gr::packet_protocols::ax25_decoder_impl:: Process a single bit through the state machine.
gr::packet_protocols::ax25_encoder_impl:
AX.25 Encoder Implementation.

This class implements AX.25 packet encoding using the real AX.25 protocol implementation from gr-m17.
gr::packet_protocols::ax25_encoder_impl:: Build AX.25 frame from input data.
gr::packet_protocols::fx25_decoder_impl:
FX.25 Decoder Implementation.

This class implements FX.25 packet decoding using the real FX.25 protocol implementation from gr-m17.
gr::packet_protocols::fx25_decoder_impl:: Process a single bit through the state machine.
gr::packet_protocols::fx25_encoder_impl:
FX.25 Encoder Implementation.

This class implements FX.25 packet encoding using the real FX.25 protocol implementation from gr-m17.
gr::packet_protocols::il2p_encoder_impl:

gr::packet_protocols::kiss_tnc_impl:
KISS TNC Implementation.

This class implements KISS TNC functionality using the real AX.25 protocol implementation from gr-m17.
